344 Dimensionality Reduction with Principal Component Analysis
Figure 10.16 PCA
can be viewed as a
linear auto-encoder.
It encodes the
high-dimensional
data xinto a
lower-dimensional
representation
(code) z∈RM and
decodes zusing a
decoder. The
decoded vector ˜xis
the orthogonal
projection of the
original data xonto
the M-dimensional
principal subspace.
